Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now interact with a large panel of smart products from Legrand, Netatmo and BTicino. The compatible products are : - Legrand or BTicino smart light switches, roller shutter switches, ventilation switches, power outlets, modules for electrical panel from the 'with Netatmo' ranges - Netatmo Smart Indoor and Outdoor Cameras - Netatmo Smart Video Doorbell - Netatmo Smart Thermostat and Smart Radiator Valves - Legrand or BTicino Smarther with Netatmo connected thermostat - BTicino Smarther AC, IR emitter and HVAC actuator - Netatmo Smart AC Controller - Classe 300EOS with Netatmo - MyHomeServer1 Caution : - To use the Netatmo Weather Station, refer to the 'Netatmo Weather' skill. - To use a Smarther thermostat that you have installed on 'Legrand Thermostat' application, refer to the 'Thermostat Smarther' skill. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Legrand - Netatmo - BTicino account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-uk)
When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names: Use the names you set up already. These are shown in the Netatmo skill and can be changed Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups-uk)
Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following: "Alexa, increase bathroom by 1 degree" "Alexa, set bedroom temperature to 21 degrees" "Alexa, what is the living room set to?" "Alexa, show the outdoor camera" "Alexa, turn on garden light'' "Alexa, turn on the coffee machine" "Alexa, turn off ceiling light" "Alexa, set ceiling light to thirty percent" "Alexa, open the roller shutter" "Alexa, set kitchen blinds to forty percent" "Alexa, turn on the ventilation" "Alexa, activate wake up" "Alexa, talk to the front door" “Alexa, turn on staircase light”
